channel.title: Want to start a server? (hope it's the good place)
channel.description: I have a very old "BlackScape" I think. It works fine for now. 1. I want my server on internet so friends can join. 2. I want some people as shops? Can someone help me with getting the server on internet? And can someone help me with the "shops" script? :confused: Notice that I don't have NPC.cfg And that files. I only have: Data (folder) savedGames (folder) compile.bat run.bat client.java Cryption.java Item.java misc.java Player.java PlayerHandler.java PlayerSave.java RaGEZONE.txt SaveGameHandler.java server.java stream.java

item.title: Want to start a server? (hope it's the good place)
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Liam123:

You’ve got winterloves i think. The first ever private server, if you want to build the 400+ you can start from this.

You fail. You canot build a 400+ server off of a winterlove base. All the packets, all the clinet loading, everything changed in the engine upgrade.

Read full topic

item.title: Want to start a server? (hope it's the good place)
item.dc:creator: @scillman scillman
item.description:
@scillman wrote:

I have a very old “BlackScape” I think.
It works fine for now.

  1. I want my server on internet so friends can join.
  2. I want some people as shops?
    Can someone help me with getting the server on internet?
    And can someone help me with the “shops” script?

    Notice that I don’t have NPC.cfg And that files. I only have:
    Data (folder)
    savedGames (folder)
    compile.bat
    run.bat
    client.java
    Cryption.java
    Item.java
    misc.java
    Player.java
    PlayerHandler.java
    PlayerSave.java
    RaGEZONE.txt
    SaveGameHandler.java
    server.java
